summary.span: 定义对 ASP.NET 应用程序内所有应用程序对象公用的方法、属性和事件。

span.span: Defines the methods, properties, and events that are common to all application objects in an ASP.NET application.

summary.span: 此类是用户在 Global.asax 文件中定义的应用程序的基类。

span.span: This class is the base class for applications that are defined by the user in the Global.asax file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例类中的 ASP.NET 基础结构，不是由用户直接创建。Instances of the class are created in the ASP.NET infrastructure, not by the user directly. 一个实例类用于在其生存期内处理多请求。One instance of the class is used to process many requests in its lifetime. 但是，它可以一次处理只请求一次。However, it can process only one request at a time. 因此，可以使用成员变量来存储每个请求数据。Thus, member variables can be used to store per-request data. 应用程序引发的事件可以由实现的自定义模块接口或通过在 Global.asax 中定义的事件处理程序代码文件。An application raises events that can be handled by custom modules that implement the interface or by event handler code that is defined in the Global.asax file. 实现的自定义模块接口可置于 App_Code 文件夹中或在 DLL 中的 Bin 文件夹中。Custom modules that implement the interface can be put in the App_Code folder or in a DLL in the Bin folder. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). > [!NOTE] > 当在集成模式下运行 IIS 7.0，Bin 文件夹或 App_Code 文件夹中的自定义模块应用于请求管道中的所有请求。When running IIS 7.0 in Integrated mode, custom modules in the App_Code folder or Bin folder apply to all requests in the request pipeline. 事件处理程序代码放在 Global.asax 文件仅适用于映射到 ASP.NET 处理程序的请求。Event handler code in the Global.asax file only applies to requests that are mapped to an ASP.NET handler. 按以下顺序引发的应用程序事件：The application events are raised in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 7. 后事件和之前事件，创建事件处理程序 （这是对应的请求 URL 的页面）。After the event and before the event, an event handler (which is a page that corresponds to the request URL) is created. 当服务器在运行 IIS 7.0，在集成模式下和在最低.NET Framework 版本 3.0，引发事件。When a server is running IIS 7.0 in Integrated mode and at least the .NET Framework version 3.0, the event is raised. 当服务器运行 IIS 7.0 经典模式或早期版本的 IIS 中时，无法处理此事件。When a server is running IIS 7.0 in Classic mode or an earlier version of IIS, this event cannot be handled. 8. 9. 10. 11. 执行事件处理程序。The event handler is executed. 12. 13. 14. 后引发事件，任何现有的响应筛选器将筛选的输出。After the event is raised, any existing response filters will filter the output. 15. 16. 17. 。. 在 IIS 7.0 集成模式下和在支持此事件最低.NET Framework 3.0This event is supported in IIS 7.0 Integrated mode and at least the .NET Framework 3.0 18. 此事件是受支持的 IIS 7.0 集成模式下并且至少.NET Framework 3.0This event is supported IIS 7.0 Integrated mode and at least the .NET Framework 3.0 19. ## Examples 下面的两个示例演示如何使用类和其事件。The following two examples demonstrate how to use the class and its events. 第一个示例演示如何创建自定义 HTTP 模块并连接到它的事件。The first example demonstrates how to create a custom HTTP module and connect an event to it. 第二个示例演示如何修改 Web.config 文件。The second example demonstrates how to modify the Web.config file. 下面的示例演示如何创建自定义 HTTP 模块和连接到 HTTP 模块事件。The following example demonstrates how to create a custom HTTP module and connect the event to the HTTP module. HTTP 模块截获 Web 应用程序资源，从而使您可以筛选客户端请求的每个请求。HTTP modules intercept each request to Web application resources, thereby allowing you to filter client requests. 订阅的任何 HTTP 模块事件必须实现接口。Any HTTP module that subscribes to an event must implement the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Web.HttpApplication1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpApplication1/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.HttpApplication1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpApplication1/vb/source.vb#1)] 自定义 HTTP 模块中的事件可以发生之前，必须修改 Web.config 文件中的配置设置，以通知有关 HTTP 模块 ASP.NET。Before an event in a custom HTTP module can occur, you must modify the configuration settings in the Web.config file to notify ASP.NET about the HTTP module. 下面的示例演示中的相应的配置设置`httpModules`Web.config 文件的部分。The following example shows the appropriate configuration setting in the `httpModules` section of the Web.config file. 以下设置适用于早期版本的 IIS 和 IIS 7.0 经典模式。The following setting applies to IIS 7.0 Classic mode and to earlier versions of IIS. ```csharp ``` ```vb ``` 以下设置适用于 IIS 7.0 集成模式。The following setting applies to IIS 7.0 Integrated mode. ```csharp ``` ```vb ```

summary.span: 当 ASP.NET 获取与当前请求关联的当前状态（如会话状态）时发生。

span.span: Occurs when ASP.NET acquires the current state (for example, session state) that is associated with the current request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建事件处理程序后，将引发事件。The event is raised after the event handler has been created. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 有关处理的示例事件，请参阅概述主题。For an example of handling the event, see the overview topic.

span.span: Occurs when an unhandled exception is thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发的异常事件可以访问通过调用方法。The exception that raises the event can be accessed by a call to the method. 如果你的应用程序生成自定义错误输出，禁止显示默认的错误消息，通过调用由 ASP.NET 生成方法。If your application generates custom error output, suppress the default error message that is generated by ASP.NET by a call to the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果你的 Web 应用程序包含 XML Web 服务，则无法使用用于这些服务的全局异常处理的事件。If your Web application contains XML Web services, you cannot use the event for global exception handling of those services. XML Web 服务的 HTTP 处理程序使用 XML Web 服务中出现，并将其转换为 SOAP 错误之前的任何异常调用。The HTTP handler for XML Web services consumes any exception that occurs in an XML Web service and converts it to a SOAP fault before the being called. 若要处理 XML Web 服务异常，生成的 SOAP 扩展来处理自定义全局异常处理程序中的 Web 服务异常。To handle XML Web service exceptions, build a SOAP extension to process Web service exceptions in a custom global exception handler. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

summary.span: 获取为网站配置的默认输出缓存提供程序的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the default output-cache provider that is configured for a Web site.
The name of the default provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以重写此方法，并使用它返回为网站配置任何输出缓存提供程序的名称。You can override this method and use it to return the name of any output-cache provider that is configured for a Web site. ASP.NET 检索命名的提供程序的引用，并使用它来存储当前正在执行的请求的输出缓存数据。ASP.NET retrieves a reference to the named provider and uses it to store output-cache data for the currently executing request. 默认情况下，在 ASP.NET 中，所有 HTTP 响应，呈现页面和控件都使用内存中输出缓存。By default, in ASP.NET, all HTTP responses, rendered pages, and controls use the in-memory output cache. 你可以更改的默认输出缓存提供程序指定不同的提供程序名称的 Web 应用程序由`defaultProvider`。You can change the default output-cache provider that is used for a Web application by specifying a different provider name for `defaultProvider`. 此外，你可以选择不同的输出缓存提供程序针对各个控件和的各个请求。In addition, you can select different output-cache providers for individual control and for individual requests. 选择不同的输出缓存提供程序为不同 Web 用户控件的最简单方法是以声明方式使用新进行`providerName`属性中的页或控件的指令，如下面的示例中所示：The easiest way to choose a different output-cache provider for different Web user controls is to do so declaratively by using the new `providerName` attribute in a page or control directive, as shown in the following example: ``` <%@ OutputCache Duration="60" VaryByParam="None" providerName="DiskCache" %> ``` 若要指定的 HTTP 请求不同的输出缓存提供程序，重写此方法在要以编程方式指定要用于特定请求的提供程序的 Global.asax 文件。To specify a different output cache provider for an HTTP request, you override this method in the Global.asax file to programmatically specify which provider to use for a specific request. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 缓存概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5ec28012-4972-4dc3-b3e8-9d20401fe11d)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Caching Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5ec28012-4972-4dc3-b3e8-9d20401fe11d). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式指定名为的缓存提供程序`DiskCache`转至高级 aspx 页任何 HTTP 请求。The following example shows how to programmatically specify the cache provider named `DiskCache` for any HTTP request that goes to the Advanced.aspx page. ```csharp public override string GetOutputCacheProviderName(HttpContext context) { if (context.Request.Path.EndsWith("Advanced.aspx")) return "DiskCache"; else return base.GetOutputCacheProviderName(context); } ``` ```vb Public Overloads Overrides Sub GetOutputCacheProviderName(ByVal context _ As HttpContext) As String If context.Request.Path.EndsWith("Advanced.aspx") Then Return "DiskCache" Else Return MyBase.GetOutputCacheProviderName(context) End If End Sub ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件表示 ASP.NET 已授权当前请求。The event signals that ASP.NET has authorized the current request. 璹綷事件可确保身份验证和授权的请求，然后处理附加的模块或事件处理程序。Subscribing to the event ensures authentication and authorization of the request before processing the attached module or event handler. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

summary.span: 恰好在 ASP.NET 向客户端发送内容之前发生。

span.span: Occurs just before ASP.NET sends content to the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件可能出现多次。The event may occur multiple times. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). > [!WARNING] > 不要使用`PreSendRequestContent`与实现的托管模块`IHttpModule`。Do not use `PreSendRequestContent` with managed modules that implement `IHttpModule`. 设置这些属性可能会导致具有异步请求的问题。Setting these properties can cause issues with asynchronous requests. 应用程序请求路由 (ARR) 和 websocket 的组合可能会导致访问冲突异常可能会导致崩溃 w3wp。The combination of Application Requested Routing (ARR) and websockets might lead to access violation exceptions that can cause w3wp to crash. 例如，iiscore ！W3_CONTEXT_BASE::GetIsLastNotification + 68 iiscore.dll 中的已导致访问冲突的异常 (0xC0000005)。For example, iiscore!W3_CONTEXT_BASE::GetIsLastNotification+68 in iiscore.dll has caused an access violation exception (0xC0000005).
